section.heading: Reporting requirements.
section.text: Beginning December 31, 2018, and on an annual basis thereafter, the Office of Human Rights shall submit a report to the Council of the District of Columbia that includes:

para.text: The number of complaints filed pursuant to this act during the reporting period;
The number of investigations that the Office of Human Rights has conducted during the reporting period and the disposition of every complaint and investigation;
The business characteristics of the housing providers against whom complaints were filed during the reporting period, including:
The number of rental properties that the housing provider owns; and
The number of rental units in each housing accommodation that the housing provider owns.
